qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, what are the ages of patients Z. Walker and T. Jackson?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital, patient Z. Walker is 11 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson is 95 years old.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, what are the chief complaints of patients Z. Walker and T. Jackson?

content: Severe abdominal pain, vomiting, and watery diarrhea for 2 days.
Persistent low mood, loss of interest in daily activities for the past 6 months.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital, patient Z. Walker's chief complaint is severe abdominal pain, vomiting, and watery diarrhea for 2 days; according to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson's chief complaint is persistent low mood and loss of interest in daily activities for the past 6 months.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, what are the diagnoses of patients Z. Walker and T. Jackson?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital, patient Z. Walker was diagnosed with bacterial food poisoning; according to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson was diagnosed with major depressive disorder.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital, patient Z. Walker is Caucasian; according to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson is also Caucasian.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, what is the marital status of patients Z. Walker and T. Jackson?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital, patient Z. Walker is single; according to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson is widowed.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, what are the occupations of patients Z. Walker and T. Jackson?

content: Occupation and Working Conditions: Student at Bridgewater Elementary School.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, Z. Walker or T. Jackson?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: Z. Walker was admitted on October 21, and T. Jackson was admitted on July 11. T. Jackson was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, whose pulse rate was higher upon admission, Z. Walker or T. Jackson?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: Z. Walker's pulse rate was 105 bpm, and T. Jackson's pulse rate was 70 bpm. Z. Walker's pulse rate was higher upon admission.
